title: LeetCode Medium Problems - Python Solutions
description: Solve medium-level algorithmic problems with optimized Python code across key patterns: stack, sliding window, heap, tree, and more

title: Python Internals Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Python's internal workings and CPython implementation details

title: Python Data Structures for LeetCode
description: Master Python data structures, algorithms, and patterns essential for coding interviews and LeetCode problems

title: Python Dunder Methods & Magic
description: Explore Python's magic methods, operator overloading, and advanced object-oriented programming techniques

title: Python Type System & Memory
description: Deep dive into Python's type system, memory allocation, object lifecycle, and performance optimization

title: JVM Internals Quiz
description: Explore Java Virtual Machine architecture, garbage collection, and performance optimization

title: Go Language Internals Quiz
description: Deep dive into Go runtime, goroutines, channels, and memory management

title: Scala Slick API Design
description: Master the Scala Slick API for functional relational mapping, including advanced querying, schema management, and database interaction patterns

title: Advanced Data Structures - Python Coding
description: Master advanced data structures including Trie, Hash Maps, Circular Buffers, Monotonic Stack, and Union-Find with real coding problems

title: AWS EKS & Kubernetes Secrets Management
description: Master AWS EKS secrets management including External Secrets Operator, IRSA, Secret Store CSI Driver, and security best practices

title: Cryptocurrency Derivatives Trading
description: Master crypto derivatives trading including perpetuals, margin requirements, funding mechanisms, P&L calculations, and risk management based on Gemini exchange documentation

title: Order Management Systems & FIX Protocol Quiz
description: Master Order Management System design, exchange connectivity, and FIX protocol concepts with 50 real-world interview questions

title: Apache Airflow Programming & Concepts
description: Master Apache Airflow workflow orchestration including DAGs, operators, executors, scheduling, task management, and production best practices

title: AWS IAM Policies & Cross-Account Permissions
description: Master AWS IAM policies, S3 cross-account access, SQS cross-account operations, permission evaluation, and security best practices

title: Terraform HCL & Terragrunt Principles
description: Master Terraform HCL syntax, infrastructure as code principles, Terragrunt best practices, state management, and production deployment strategies

title: Bit Manipulation - LeetCode Coding Problems
description: Master bit manipulation techniques with 30 coding problems covering XOR patterns, bit arithmetic, binary operations, and advanced bit tricks for coding interviews

title: Apache Kafka Fundamentals - Part 1
description: Master Apache Kafka fundamentals including producers, topics, partitions, message structure, and key differences from JMS/IBM MQ for distributed streaming

title: Apache Kafka Broker Internals - Part 2
description: Master Kafka broker architecture, leader election, message reliability, failover mechanisms, acknowledgments, quorum concepts, and broker roles in distributed systems

title: Apache Kafka Consumer & Groups - Part 3
description: Master Kafka consumer interactions, consumer groups, transactions, message ordering, rebalancing, offset management, Consumer API, and failover strategies

title: Bitwise Operations - Part I
description: 50 questions covering bitwise operations, binary arithmetic, and XOR patterns. Content based on https://github.com/mohanmca/CodingChallenges/blob/master/src/md/coding_patterns/25_bits_binary_anki.md

title: Fenwick Tree (Binary Indexed Tree) Fundamentals
description: Master Fenwick Tree basics, update and getsum operations, and coding patterns with 50 questions

title: Rabin‚ÄìKarp Rolling Hash Fundamentals
description: Learn polynomial rolling hashes, base/prime choices, collision handling, and Python implementation details for Rabin‚ÄìKarp.

title: PostgreSQL Data Modeling & Index Design
description: First-principles data modeling, index selection (B-Tree, BRIN, GIN, GiST), and a systematic approach to diagnose and improve non-performant Postgres.

title: PostgreSQL Query Planning Internals
description: Deep dive into the cost model, JIT, parallelism, join strategies, extended statistics, and EXPLAIN diagnostics.

title: PostgreSQL VACUUM & Autovacuum Deep Dive
description: Hands-on maintenance concepts: visibility map, HOT, freezing, bloat, vacuum tuning, monitoring, and safe rebuild strategies.
